🛠️ How to Use the Map

  • Hover: Move your mouse over a garden to see its name.
  • Click: Click a garden to view details in a popup.
  • Filter by Grade: Use buttons to show only selected grades (I, II*, II).
  • Filter by Date: Adjust the slider to filter by registration year.
  • Search: Enter a name or postal code to find specific locations.
  • Legend: Check the legend to understand grade colors.

📌 Data Source

https://historicengland.org.uk
